abstract: The banking giant said it was scaling back its investment banking operations and shedding an additional 650 jobs.
snippet: The banking giant said it was scaling back its investment banking operations and shedding an additional 650 jobs.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America, the banking giant, said on Tuesday that it was scaling back its investment banking operations, shedding an additional 650 jobs after suffering heavy trading losses from bad mortgage investments.

headline.main: Bank of America Curbs Investment Banking
headline.print_headline: Bank of America Trims Investment Banking Operations
